name: talent.io
slogan: First selective European recruitment platform for software engineers and developers
description:
talent.io is the first selective, targeted and innovative European recruitment platform for software engineers and developers. 

It is the simplest way for software engineers to find great jobs in innovative companies.

Our process is simple: We select the top 10% of engineers who are looking for a new job and make them visible on talent.io for 4 weeks only. The companies directly apply to the candidate who decide who he/she want to talk to. 

We currently operate in Paris, Lyon, Lille, Bordeaux, Toulouse, London, Hamburg, Berlin and Amsterdam. 
Over 150,000 developers and 3,000 companies (including Deezer, Blablacar, Parrot, N26, Monzo, Edited and many of the best startups in Europe) have already signed up on the platform and thousands of offers are made every week to software engineers.

team.name: alison regniez
team.bioHtml: Responsible for guiding, supporting and motivating the talent advocate team.

jobs.title: Talent Advocate/Tech recruiter
jobs.description:
talent.io was created 3 years ago as a platform to simplify job searching for tech positions in Europe: the objective was to completely rethink and disrupt the recruitment market for developers.

Having raised more than €10M from venture capital firms and with offices in 9 cities across Europe including Berlin, London, Amsterdam, Paris, we are Europe’s #1 job search platform for tech professions in high demand.

OUR CONCEPT
Our concept is simple. As a candidate, instead of wasting time researching job opportunities and applying for positions, sign up to talent.io once and have companies view your profile and “apply” to you.
As a client, instead of trying to look for great talent using channels that yield low-quality leads, you gain access to new profiles which pass our high qualification bar and are actively seeking their next career move, every week.

OUR OBJECTIVE NOW
The ambition of talent.io now is to be present across all of Europe and to help billions of developers find their next professional challenge.


**Why join us:**

**Join a fast-growing company:** since 2015, talent.io has grown from 3 people in Paris to a team of 100+ in 4 countries.

**To build your skills:**you will learn from the best and have the opportunity to work with everyone in the company: colleagues in France, Netherlands and Germany, country managers and founders. You will have a chance to take ownership, have impact on the business and industry and be recognised for that.

**Be part of a European team:** we gather once a year for our start-up retreat combined with creative learning methods. We bring all the European teams together in a sunny city to take part in a quality exchange where ideas and friendships can evolve.


**What you will you be doing?**

**Identify, qualify and select the best software engineering profiles** and highlight them in each recruitment session within the talent.io marketplace. We are a very selective platform with less than 10% of developers being approved.

**Be an advocate for them to guide and help them land the best possible job:** have the ability to coach each software engineer personally in the search for their next dream job.

**Create a relationship with candidates:** Follow up with candidates throughout their interview processes and package negotiation.

**Participate and organise events in our community** (tech meet ups/conferences): be an evangelist for our brand at tech meetups and educate people about talent.io

**Work on a daily basis with our awesome Client Executive team:** ensure both companies and candidates have remarkable experiences!

**Provide constructive feedback** and work closely with our tech team to help build and improve the platform.

To know more about a day in the life of a talent advocate read more here:
https://medium.com/@talent.io/a-day-in-the-life-of-a-talent-advocate-at-talent-io-6771b77b1de8

And if you want to have an insight into our culture:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HpJ_E0OmDeI&t=42s


**Perks**

* Flexible internal working hours
* Hitchhiker Scheme – Work in another country’s office for 1 or 2 weeks
* Table Tennis
* Mario Kart on Wii U
* Free beer/wine
* Annual European retreat with the whole company
* Weekly fruit box

**Do you agree with this?**

* Love working in a team and encourage collaboration
* Come to work every day, wanting to make an impact
* You own what you do, be proactive, be responsive and have a can-do attitude

*Think Team, Make Impact and Take ownership are our 3 core values so if you agree, apply now!*


**What will you bring?**

**Experience:** 6 months to 4 years of work experience (ideally in IT / Tech companies or internal recruitment)

**Strong motivation to learn:** you would like to progress on a role 100% candidate oriented and want to have an impact on the candidate’s career. (edited) 

**Genuine interest in technology and start-ups / fast growing companies:**Creative thinker, willing to take ownership of ideas and think outside the box.

**Fluent in English**
